channel.title: How to create a multiple ncp or combad zone
channel.description:
Dear mopascape members i have my own version of hybrid pvp but i got an error i cant attack it with 2 player only 1 can attck monster because i create a new god wars thing its not multiple if you can help me post under
thank you dannymoparscape
[size=8pt]im not a leecher i am creator :) release soon[/size]
